fields.Title: Proposed ISLE Preparation for Summer Program: Comparative Composition and Design
fields.Description/Abstract:
In Fall 2015, I was in working proposal stage with Boise State's Arts and Humanities Institute for Summer 2017.  Interdisciplinary exploration in which students and I will compare and contrast composition/design and creative processes between various disciplines in the arts and humanities (local visual and performing artists and composers, writers, chefs, architects, landscape designers, and more).  AHI has shifted to a course release model, and our department needed me to teach instead of to take course releases that year, so the project was not pursued further.
Role:  Principal
